title: Wall
description: A static barrier intended to protect structures.

circuit_open_gate.description: Whether or not this gate should open based on `circuit_condition` when connected to a circuit network.

circuit_read_gate.description: Whether or not the state of the gate should be broadcast as a unit signal to a connected circuit network.

output_signal.description: What signal should be broadcast if the gate is open and `circuit_read_gate` is `true`.
